title: when i log in the boards everything is out of order
body:
when i am logged out from the boards the comments to every post are shown in a well made reddit-like organized fashion where as when i log in i can't tell who's talking to who and every comment is just in order from oldest to newest
this is really impairing my ability to interact with the community
plz help

replies.body:
Try hitting this "Show in Discussion View" button for me to switch the layout.

https://i.gyazo.com/589d30635bd28c922b7ab35a3989fa62.png
